recommended_degree: Keuangan, Akuntansi, Ekonomi, Akuntansi Manajemen (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Accountability: 
•	Use existing AR systems to administer all receiving cash.
•	Allocate customer payments to invoices within agreed timelines.
•	Maintain accurate and up-to-date customer account balances.
•	Minimize the number of unallocated or unidentified cash items.
•	Escalate discrepancies or unidentified payments for resolution.
•	Adhere to internal controls, policies, and audit requirements.
Qualifications:
•	Willing to be placed in Bogor, West Java.
•	Fluent in English both written and spoken.
•	Min.D3 from Finance, Accounting, Economic, or Management majors.
•	Familiar with Account Receivable Applications.
